vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.21;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043)
Group of ash.bel (אַשְׁבֵּל "Ashbel" H0788)
§ Ashbelites = "a man in God: a man of Baal: fire of Bel: I will make a path"
descendants of Ashbel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Asbel, hijo de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞實別族 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "屬神的人: 巴力的人: 我要鋪路"
亞實別的後裔 (民 26:38)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚实别族 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "属神的人: 巴力的人: 我要铺路"
亚实别的后裔 (民 26:38)
